text: Gabriella Tucci (4 August 1929 – 11 July 2020) was an Italian operatic soprano. She was born in Rome. She made her debut at La Scala in Milan in 1959, as Mimi in La bohème. Tucci performed as Donna Elvira in Don Giovanni, Elvira in I puritani, Gilda in Rigoletto, Violetta in La traviata, and Marguerite in Faust, as well as Maddalena in Andrea Chénier and the title role in Tosca. Tucci died on 11 July 2020 in Rome, aged 90.Si è spento a 90 anni il soprano Gabriella Tucci connessiallopera.it ==References== ==Other websites== * GabriellaTucci.it Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian opera singers Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian singers Category:Actors from Rome
title: Gabriella Tucci
